name: Langa (Out of Business)
tagline: The World's Leading Node.js & React.js Experts
description:
Langa is a software consulting company and a cadre of passionate full-stack developers. We partner with clients across the globe to deliver software solutions that address their toughest challenges.
Our Node.js experts work directly with clients to build scalable, high-performance, enterprise-grade software.
Our expert React.js developers deliver amazing web experiences using React.js, GraphQL, and other modern web technologies.
